original_title: Computer Crime Investigation Division says cyber crime complaints are increasing
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The police say that the number of complaints received regarding cyber crimes is increasing.

The ASP of the Computer Crime Investigation Division Jaya Nethsiri says that 154 complaints have been received in the past few months of this year alone, regarding sexual harassment through social media.
